reviews.review:
Like the original Portal? Well if you do there no reason to skip out on this installment of the series. The same humor from the first returns and improves upon the original.I found myself laughing at  each of the comments made by the expanded cast. This title also sheds some light on the origins of GLaDos and Arperture Science. Theres even a few references to the Half Life universe that appear in the game for those who  explore the levels carefully and pay attention.
   The game is about 2 to 3 times as long as the original (depending on the player). The portal mechanics return but bring new elements into the puzzle solving such as Repulsion Gel, Excusion Funnels and Jump Pads. The co-op is fun and challenging requiring communication between both players to complete each test. Not game of the Year but my inner nerd was giddy from start to finish.
Do it!
Awesomesauce.
Brain teasing fun, while the computer insults you = win.
Lemon Win.
Jogo do ano! Eu falei isso antes do lançamento, agora tá confirmado!
Completely mind-blowing - I love this game. Far more interactive and innovative than it's predecessor. The perfect balance of Puzzle and Comedy that anyone can enjoy.

Absolutely amazing. Valve did such a wonderful job in creating something unique, funny, compelling, and satisfying. Keep in mind, this is coming from a guy who only normally gets kicks out of multiplayer games because I am tired of AI but the single player in this game and the original are amazing. If you have not experienced it yet, do it. You will not regret it.

Originalni zazitek, vypiplany do poslednich datailu. Reseni logickych problemu je zabavne, atmosferu hodne odlehceje vsudypritomny humor. Dobre napsany pribeh vas u hry udrzi az do konce. Akorat, ze pak bude chtit vic :-)
fuhg yes
Short sweet and fun. Puzzles are generally easy with one or two making you think outside the box. Get it if cheap. Funny and easy going game.
This is the one of the funnest and funniest games I have ever played, as well as the most original as simple game. I bloody love it.
Fantástico!
Live the dream. You deserve it.
Un juego de los que ya no hay, único.  El coop es increíblemente divertido.  Imprescindible.
近頃じゃちょっとない無条件に「最高」と言えるタイトル。まだプレイしていないフレとプレイするのがおすすめ。セールの常連なので狙って買おう。
If you don't like this game, you have no soul.

The single-player campaign is utterly hilarious, and the puzzles took me a total of six hours to beat the first time. After that, the story should keep you going for replays, and there's always the co-op and the level editor.
Best game ever for PC!
Da gibt es nur eins zu sagen. Jeder zocker sollte dieses Game haben. Wenn ich es mit 3 Wörtern beschreiben müsste, dann wären die Wörter.... GENIAL GENIAL GENIAL.
If you don't have this game, then you must get it. Don't use money as an excuse, I'm sure your parents wouldn't notice an extra $50 on their credit card.
The funniest, wittiest, and most clever game I have ever played.

About three times longer than the original, it's about as close to perfection as you can get.

I wish it was longer....... I just love the testing.
mega gut das game, musst auch mal ausprobieren :D
Nossa, muito legal o portal 2 single player and cooperative. Espero que a Steam continue evoluindo sempre.
An amazing 3d puzzle, plaform-them up game. The single player and co-op are superb! Must Have NOW!
Juste excellent, le seul reproche faisable est qu'on devient accro trop vite... Du coup le jeu paraît trop court...
Hey you if you liked Portal and thought "hey I would like more portal" THEN THIS GAME IS FOR YOU.
Can't wait for Portal 3! :D
Brainf*ck <3
재밌다!!싱글 엔딩 봤으니, 코옵해야되는데 할 사람이 없네ㅠㅠ
Works nicely under GNU/Linux <3
Believe the hype.
Seriously. Play it.
One of the best. Get it! :D
Great game but i can't believe i completed the one player so fast, around 15 hours.

Portal 2 est une réussite incontestable, une véritable comédie interactive. Je recommande cette petite merveille à tous...

                                                        THE BEST GAME OF THE YEAR

Jeu fort sympathique ! Pur moment de détente ! Musique et graphisme magnifiques ! On retrouve bien le sérieux et le grain de folie de valve dans cette épisode ! Seul défault ... je n'ai jamais été bloqué par les "Tests" que se soit pour le mode solo ou coop ... et je trouve la campagne solo courte .... très courte !!! Et le mode coop .... encore plus court ... je n'ai même pas envie de le refaire pour les succès ... je suis donc content de pas avoir mis 50 euros dedans ! J'espère que les DLC seront gratuites !

Repeating their pattern from Half-Life and Left 4 Dead, Valve has created another sequel that improves upon the original in every way possible, the result is not only one of the greatest sequels but one of the greatest games ever. The experience expresses the gamut of emotions; you'll laugh and cry, you'll reflect and enjoy, yet most notably, you will never forget it.

So much more than a puzzle game.

10/10
My game of the year. Absolutely gorgeous, in singleplayer and multiplayer.
zkracene: Naprosto super!
Cool game =)
Bloody Awesome, Nuff Said

Veramente fantastico!!!! Ottimo gioco!! Gameplay innovativo e una storia piena di colpi di scena e sunspance!!
CONSIGLIATISSIMO!!!
Inoltre un ottimo comparto multiplayer!

My dear, beautiful darling.
My child that I admire.
To my dear, farewell!
My dear girl, why don't you stay away, yes away from science?
My dear, dear girl.
To my lovely.
To my dear.
To my﻿ dear.
To my Child.
My dear, dear to me!
Woww, this game is so fu**** awesome :D
Great mind puzzle game especially a great break from killing a bunch of things or people from FPS games
Das geilste Spiel welches je gemacht wurde, einfach nur genial und der Co-op ist auch super gestaltet <3

Valve's last game is yet another game with excellent quality. The puzzles are well designed (better than in the first portal where you should have some skill), the story is also wonderful.
 
There is nothing bad about this game except the duration: too short (from the point of view of a nerdy gamer who didn't stop playing it until he finished the game), but for not hardcore gamers it should be nice.
Takes a simple concept and executes flawlessly
Fucking great. Although still no cake :(
Who'd have believed Valve would ever outshine Halflife. Grander in almost every way that the original Portal.

Non un Semplice gioco: Un Capolavoro. 
Assolutamente da non perdere.

Mais longo que o primeiro jogo e repleto de revelações e especulações para mexer com qualquer fã da série Half Life.

Se você é fã da série Half Life, Portal é obrigatório praticamente!

Selon moi, Portal 1 n'était qu'un test bien interessant d'une nouvelle dimension des jeux video. Avec Portal 2, il a vraiment un scénario. Je suis resté aussi impressionné par la grandeur et la qualitée des maps. Avec ce jeu, je n'arrives tout simplement pas à arrêter de jouer quand il faut, il va vous laisser coller à votre ordi. Ma note; 9,5/10 .

Not as good as the first. lets get that out of the way. It is good but the subtlety of the first one is lost. there is just too much going on. the first it was testing with a computer trying to kill you. This one could do without Wheatly completely. If the story investigated the backstory of the founder and the facility with you turning on vital systems to reactivate certain areas so you could escape inadvertantly reacitvating the core systems of glados along the way would have been fine. but you have to deal with a character that feels shoe horned into the story to make things work. other than that the puzles are alright. the game is about 3 times longer and there are some great puzzle mechanics.  

all around its lacking what made Portal 1 unique and great, but retains the asthetics of the franchise.  7.5/10

Simplemente es el mejor juego que he jugado en mi vida. Una mecánica de juego increible al igual que su predecesor. Además, el modo multijugador ofrece una experiencia como pocos juegos he conocido, y gracías a la WORKSHOP existen una infinidad de mapas disponibles para jugar.

Nota: Jugué con calidad máxima y aunque tiene unos gráficos muy trabajados en ocasiones eché en falta el motor "Source 2".
Much better than the first, totally expands on the concept of portaling. Goes from hand holding stages to explain the concepts to face-desking frustrating puzzles.
Same as before, but it takes longer and you spend more time listening to giant talking eyeballs. Basically everything we've all been waiting 3 and a half years for.

Everyone knows this game is good. It has received dozens of accolades and since its release, still has a strong fanbase as attested to by the influx of community made maps. So instead of further praising this masterpiece, I'd prefer to explain some of its drawbacks.

Expect a lot of loading times. That is by far, my biggest gripe. After every few puzzles, you will be greeted with a loading screen. In some instances where the puzzles are extremely easy, you'll begin to feel as if you've spent more times on loading screens than actually playing.

Unfortunately (or fortunately), that is the only negative thing I have to say about this game. Face it: the puzzles are cleverly crafted, the dialogue is witty and hilarious. The campaigns, both single player and cooperative are decent in length. There really is nothing to dislike... well maybe hats. If you don't like hats, then you won't be too happy to see them online.

Grade: A
If you loved portal, this definately earned the additional number 2 in the title. You'l be quoting Cave Johnson in no time. And remember, when life gives you lemons, Dont'e make lemonade. GET ANGRY!
Probably one of my favourite games. Ever.
koop einfach nur geil

If you enjoyed one of two particular jokes (if not both) made in the original Portal and quote either of them endlessly during every waking moment of your life, this is not the game for you. Five stars!
Spudthusiasts rejoice! This game features the potato in its most prominent video game role since Farm Simulator. I highly recommend this product.

Pocas veces me he quedado sin palabras ante un juego y sin poder expresar nada, generalmente pasa con un juego malo.

Sin embargo acá pasa al revés, Portal 2 es un juego tan maravilloso que no se como recomendarlo, como describirlo.

Nada sobra, nada falta en esta obra maestra, las segundas partes si pueden ser buenas y a Valve se le ha hecho costumbre que cada continuación de sus juegos es mucho mejor que la anterior.

Portal y Portal 2 no son un juego, son una experiencia de vida, UN 10.
A thinking mans game. Love it!

Released as a sequel to the hidden gem Portal, this new generation of videogame from Valve has some great humour and is very entertaining to watch, but is so blown out of proportion by having the backng of all of the Valve team. The small, compact gameplay areas of Portal have been replaced by spaces so big that a zoom function has been included into the game.

I feel that Portal 2 was not a puzzler but a story game with some mediocre puzzle parts embedded into it. This is not what made the game unique, and some of the new features are great, but not gold. Portal created the genre that it designed and Portal 2, with its multiplayer and DLCs, may build it up but will never come close to the originality and resourcefulness of the original game. Play this once you have completed the original Portal, not before.
sorat game

The game is not only incredible but it is indispensable. The puzzles are challenging but not unfair and the cooperative mode is exceptional. Although the replay value is very low, this game definitely worth playing.

Questo gioco vale ogni euro che pagherete, ambientazione ricche di dettagli e curate, sotria divertente interpretata in maniera davvero egregia dai doppiatori che rendono vivi i personaggi principali.Il gamepaly è stato molto anpliato con molte aggiunte, ha una discreta longevità se non avete giocato il primo portal, altrimenti sarete già pronti a ragionare con i portali.Grafica notevolmente migliorata sia negli effetti che nella fisica degli oggetti e delle loro interazioni.
Inoltre in aggiunta al single player un itnera campagna da gicoare in cooperativa con un altro giocatore che vi terrà occupati dopo aver  finito la modalità per giocatore singolo.
In conclusione ritengo  che questo gioco sia un capolavoro da avere nella propria libreria.


I'm in SPAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCCEEEEEEEEEE!!!!
Sehr geiles Spiel - leider etwas kurz mit 6,5std. Und für CoOp findet sich noch keiner  :(
so amazing.. glados i love u.. even if u don´t love me^^
Well worth paying full price for. The single player is over 8 hours and the multiplayer will last much longer. Hilarious and challenging.
Great game, fantastic writing, hilarious characters, clever gameplay, and co-op.  Portal 2 is everything you would want from a Portal sequel.
Excellent game, i assure anyone playing this is going to enjoy it. It is a lot better than the first one with a better story and an excellent script. Buy it!!
Bewundern sie die Kunst!
Holy shit.  Buy this game.  Now.  Seriously.
おもしろいね　１挫折したけど２が面白かったから１も一気にクリア　まあパズルゲーだけどシナリオが結構よかった！おぬぬめ！
prima giocate l'uno... poi procuratevelo al più presto!
A work of art of a game, characters have so much personality. The first one was really good, but this is the real deal. Not a single dull moment. Simply put: a masterpiece.
This is an amazing game! 11.2/10 would portal again!
Very niec gaming

This game is just epic, they did not just copied the game mechanic from portal 1 and built some new test chambers, no, they tell a own story, much more complex than portala 1 and with several (more or less) surpring turning points and of course the awesome portal-humor... just outstanding!
And don't forget the coop-mode, not so long as the singleplayer, but still lots of clever puzzles to solve!
This game is the most astounding game since the first Half Life. You can always trust Valve to revolutionize gaming.

BUY IT
Do I really have to say more?
Ultimate Experience!

Loved the puzzles, loved the characters, loved the dialogue, and loved falling faster and FAAASSTEER!!!  Co-op is great. Single player is epic. The sooner you play this, the better of a person you'll become.

Game do ano de 2011 com certeza.. Muito inteligente. Já nasceu Clássico!. Basta olhar a nota dele para verem com o game é bom mesmo (95 de 100).

Ele vem com um modo cooperativo que deixa ainda mais desafiante os puzzles do game.

The game is fun, when first time playing it, it will take a while, but after that it shouldn't take that long, but still it takes couple of hours to complete after the first complete. I haven't found any game breaking flaws from this game, only couple of small glitches.

Only minus compared to first portal in this game is, that there's no cake.
provatelo non ve ne pentirete!!!
Great game, lots of funny stuff and an awesome storyline for both Single- and Multiplayer

Love the game, already played it through a few times, purchased it on special =p
